name: Click Game
description:
This game was made as practice to learn how to code and other things about using unity and C#. In hopes one day I can publish something much greater that is actually worthy of anyone playing.

Click on the blue circles to gain points based on the size of the circle. Each circle you click gains you 300 - 100 points and more combo, combo is a direct multiplier of how many points gained so it adds up quickly. The more combo you have, the more combo you gain aswell, at 10 combo you gain 2 per circle hit, at 50 you gain 3, the requirement to gain more combo sets multiplied 5 times each time you reach one of those combo "goals"

If you go more then a second without clicking any circles the combo breaks alerting you of this in the top left corner.
